title: 820-00928-A Schematic and Boardview
message:
Hi Guys,
I just got a mid-2017 15" Retina MacBook Pro in for repair. The logic board has some liquid damage. I'm not having any luck at all finding schematics and board view for this 820-00928-A so I wanted to ask if anyone knows if this is available anywhere or if it's just not out in the wild yet. I know this forum isn't for sharing these documents and I'm not asking for someone to provide the documents, I just want to know if I should stop trying to find it if that makes sense.

Does anyone know if there are schematics for a different logic board that are similar enough to be useful?

Cheers,

Alex

title: 820-00928-A Schematic and Boardview
message: I have not seen it. 00875 may be useful but the board view will of course be different. All circuit design is very similar between models but you have to figure out what is what.

title: 820-00928-A Schematic and Boardview
message: Just in case anyone else reads this thread with the same original question that I had. The 820-00281 schematic and board view are the closest things I could find that is similar enough to be useful for troubleshooting.

title: 820-00928-A Schematic and Boardview
message:
Hi

I have 1 macbook pro with 15-inch touchbar MB 820-00928-A Model: A1707 which has been damaged by a liquid.

Measuring the tensions I have
:
PP20V_USBC_XB_VBUS ----- F3001 = 20v

PPBUS_G3H  = 12,5v


PP3V3_G3H_REG_R  = 3.4v

SPI_MLBROM_CS_L ---------- i only have this in SPI ROM  = 3.6v

title: 820-00928-A Schematic and Boardview
message: Don't hijack an old post! Make a new one.....
